heading: Big Sand Volleyball
description: Designed and developed a new website for the Big Sand volleyball club using TypeScript, React (create-react-app), Material UI, Styled Components.

heading: Personal Website
description: Designed and developed this website using TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion

heading: How to be a mentee
description: Shared my experiences as a mentee at TELUS and advice on how to make the most out of your mentorship

heading: Microfrontend Benefits
description: Co-presented a live demo on Micro Frontend Benefits at the 2023 TELUS CIO Tech Conference, resulting in 40 mins of knowledge sharing x 400 TELUS team members

heading: Making time for personal development
description: Co-hosted an event as part of the 2023 Connections (TELUS' Women and Allies community) Self-Investment Series, resulting in 90 mins of personal development x 215 TELUS team members

heading: Experimentation with Gen AI for Refactoring
description: Experimented with internal TELUS generative AI tools for code refactoring. Shared findings and starting point at bi-weekly TELUS Tech Forum with 80 team members x 10 mins of learning
